title: Saving Marriages (and Christmas) with Majandra Delfino
itunes:title: Saving Marriages (and Christmas) with Majandra Delfino
description:
For many people, being stuck in the house with your partner for 21 months straight isn’t the best recipe for romance and smooth sailing. Add on the holidays and, holy hell, you might as well just re-download Tinder. Luckily, Dr. MD Majanda Delfino is here to save us all from swiping yes on anything except kisses from our Mr. or Mrs. Plus, Ku and Su exchange gifts! 

 

Please note, Add To Cart contains mature themes and may not be appropriate for all listeners. 

 

To see all products mentioned in this episode, head to @addtocartpod on Instagram. To purchase any of the products, see below. 

 

  • Relationship journals: https://bit.ly/relationshipjourmals
  • Incense matches to shit with no shame: https://bit.ly/incensematch
  • Earplugs so the other person can sleep and you can click clack away: https://bit.ly/loopearplugsfordavid
  • Esther Perel’s book, Mating in Captivity: https://bit.ly/matingincaptivity
  • Esther Perel’s podcast, “Where Should We Begin” https://bit.ly/whereshouldwebegin
  • For anything else related to Esther Perel, like her board game, check out her website: https://bit.ly/everythingestherperel
  • To end your divorce easy, go to: https://bit.ly/itsovereasydivorce
  • For the domestic abuse hotline in the US, text “START” to 88788 or go to: https://bit.ly/thehotlineofficial
  • For the domestic abuse hotline in the UK, call 0808 2000 247: https://bit.ly/womxnsaiduk
  • In Canada: https://sheltersafe.ca 
  • And in Australia: https://www.1800respect.org.au/
  • Ku’s gifts to Su:
    • Manta brush: https://bit.ly/mantahairbrush
    • Blueland holiday hand soaps: https://bit.ly/bluelandholidayhandsoap
    • Amethyst crystal: https://bit.ly/desertsageamethyst
    • Necessaire Body Wash: https://bit.ly/necessairbodywash
    • Hair Towel: https://bit.ly/crownaffairhairtowel 
    • Forever Eye Mask: https://bit.ly/forevereyemask
  • Su’s Gifts to Ku:
    • Toothpaste from Buly: https://bit.ly/bulyestablishment1803
    • Selenite Lamp: https://bit.ly/selenitelamp

 

Stay up to date with us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram at @LemonadaMedia. 

 

Joining Lemonada Premium is a great way to support our show and get bonus content. Subscribe today at bit.ly/lemonadapremium. 

 

Click this link for a list of current sponsors and discount codes for this show and all Lemonada shows: lemonadamedia.com/sponsors

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
